structure.unit: A AUTOMATED MOTOR VEHICLE REGISTRATION SYSTEM

law.catch_line: Prerequisites to acceptance of application for title.
law.text: No county clerk shall accept an application for a certificate of registration or title, or license plate, unless the vehicle bears an apparently legitimate vehicle identification number, and if required, an apparently legitimate motor and frame number, as indicated by an owner's application.
law.history: Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 164, sec. 14, effective July 15, 1982.
